summary: Arthur answers a distress call from Princess Selenia, who is menaced by the nefarious Maltazard.
cast: Freddie Highmore|Selena Gomez|Omar Sy|Fergie|Mia Farrow|Snoop Dogg|Jimmy Fallon|Logan Miller|Robert Stanton|Cem Yilmaz|Will.i.am|Mylène Farmer|Jean-Paul Rouve|Lou Reed|Penny Balfour|Gérard Darmon|Fred Testot|David Gasman|Barbara Scaff|Michel Duchaussoy|Bernard Alane|Doug Rand|Paul Bandey|Jacques Frantz|Saïd Amadis|Ron Crawford|Jerry Di Giacomo|Leslie Clack|Cartman|Jean Bejote Njamba|Allan Wenger|Matthew Gonder|Rohff|Alan Fairbairn|Laurent Mendy
title: Arthur y la venganza de Maltazard
